context_bundle.summary: Windows MCP server core functionality and tool matrix. Comprehensive Windows automation including file I/O, process management, PowerShell execution, clipboard, window control, and daemon services.

onboarding.quick_start: 17 tools: file read/write, PowerShell exec, clipboard get/set, window list/info, process list/kill, service management, scheduled tasks, daemon control, system cleanup
common_patterns: PowerShell: execute_powershell (working, use for complex operations)
known_errors: send_keys: Tool execution failed - use AHK instead (T96)
manage_files: PowerShell Count property error on duplicates
backup_user_data: Path parsing and Count property errors
kill_process: Execution failed but process terminates anyway
manage_service: Permission denied on some services (PrintNotify)
